actions.name: Loose Rocks

cost.trigger: The user is hit by a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

actions.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Physical- or Special-Category attack.

Effect: The user has a 50% chance to freely use Stealth Shard.

actions.name: Stealth Rock
actions.description: Effect: The user places 5 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 3m of a rock mine, it homes in on them, destroying itself and dealing a Tick of Rock-Type damage.

actions.name: Stealth Shard
actions.description: Effect: The user places 2 floating rock mine Hazards within Range. When a creature moves within 3m of a rock mine, it homes in on them, destroying itself and dealing a Tick of Rock-Type damage.

system.description:
Trigger: The user is hit by a Physical or Special category attack.

Effect: Connection - Stealth Rock. The user has a 50% chance to freely use Stealth Shard.
